Description: Increase energy density requirement for battery cells and modules to meet or exceed Chinese standards
Risk: Risk of non-compliance with Chinese regulations, potential market access issues, and customer dissatisfaction.

Description: Enhance water ingress protection level of battery pack housing to IP68 or higher
Risk: Risk of water damage and potential safety hazards in extreme environmental conditions.

Description: Comply with Chinese national standards for high-voltage wiring and connectors
Risk: Risk of non-compliance with Chinese regulations, potential safety issues, and legal liabilities.

Description: Implement additional safety monitoring features or redundancies for high-voltage battery systems
Risk: Risk of potential safety hazards and regulatory non-compliance, but mitigated by existing safety measures.

Description: Ensure compatibility with Chinese charging standards and protocols (GB/T standards)
Risk: Risk of incompatibility with Chinese charging infrastructure, customer dissatisfaction, and potential market access issues.

Description: Incorporate additional safety systems or components required by Chinese regulations
Risk: Risk of non-compliance with Chinese regulations, potential safety concerns, and legal liabilities.

Description: Comply with Chinese national standards for electromagnetic compatibility (EMC) in electric vehicles
Risk: Risk of non-compliance with Chinese regulations, potential electromagnetic interference issues, and legal liabilities.

Description: Ensure markings and labels comply with Chinese regulations for high-voltage components
Risk: Risk of non-compliance with Chinese regulations, potential customer confusion, and minor legal liabilities.

Description: Implement additional EMC measures or testing procedures to meet Chinese national standards
Risk: Risk of potential electromagnetic interference issues, but mitigated by existing EMC measures.

Description: Enhance fire and explosion protection systems to comply with Chinese regulations
Risk: Risk of non-compliance with Chinese regulations, potential safety hazards, legal liabilities, and customer dissatisfaction.

Description: Implement processes and documentation for certification and homologation in the Chinese market
Risk: Risk of inability to sell or distribute the product in the Chinese market due to lack of required certifications and approvals.
